channel.title: Change the way the npc(shop) is faceing?
channel.description: Change the way the npc(shop) is faceing?

item.title: Change the way the npc(shop) is faceing?
item.dc:creator: @theunforgive theunforgive
item.description:
@theunforgive wrote:

spawn = 584 3085 3492 0 0 0 0 0 1

its a shop, i moved but i want him to face the other way!

[quote=“Javafire, post:2, topic:382563”][quote author=theunforgive link=topic=478357.msg3501190#msg3501190 date=1297738432]
Change the way the npc(shop) is faceing?

[/quote]
that’s all based in where you put the npc in autospawn.cfg (unless it is named otherwise) please give me the spawn code of the npc, and i’ll show you where to edit.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Change the way the npc(shop) is faceing?
